TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JobClient extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Job management.
Docs.remarks:
For more information, see .
This client creates lifetime long instances of that are tied to the URI of the IoT hub specified, configure any proxy settings, and connection lease timeout. For that reason, the instances are not static and an application using this client should create and save it for all use. Repeated creation may cause socket exhaustion.

Docs.param: IoT hub host name.
Credential that generates a SAS token to authenticate with IoT hub. See .
The HTTP transport settings.
Docs.summary: Creates JobClient using a shared access signature provided and refreshed as necessary by the caller.
Docs.remarks: Users may wish to build their own shared access signature (SAS) tokens rather than give the shared key to the SDK and let it manage signing and renewal. The object gives the SDK access to the SAS token, while the caller can update it as necessary using the method.
